text:
@narendramodi Respected PM Sir,
Celing to be fixed to all hospitals to remove uncertainty on COVID-19 med exps so that MIG's spendings can be increased & HELICOPTER money in terms of busines wil reach to the society.
People shd get confidence abt their income sec, job opp & economy growth. 
Ty
